text: Shahram Haghighat Doost () is an Iranian actor born on March 18th 1973 in Rasht, Iran. His first cinematic experience was acting in the movie The Pear Tree directed by Dariush Mehrjui. His first serious appearances on television can be seen in the series Red Line directed by Ghasem Jafari and The story of a City make by Asghar Farhadi.
